CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Steeler Power for 1961 NFL Title Chase - Explosive Backs - From left: John Henry Johnson, Bobby Layne, Tom (The Bomb) Tracy and Charley Scales. Layne will furnish the 'arm,' while the others will provide the 'leg drive' for cracking enemy defenses."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Steelers football players no. 35 John Henry Johnson, no. 22 Bobby Layne, no. 30 Tom "The Bomb" Tracy, and no. 34 Charlie Scales, posed on athletic field at Slippery Rock State Teachers College
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Steelers (Football team).Men--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Football players--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Slippery Rock State Teachers College.
